description: This is a JUnit test class for SummaryService, containing unit tests that verify the behavior of summary generation and retrieval based on log entries and user data.

classes.name: SummaryServiceTest
classes.description: A test class containing unit tests for the SummaryService, verifying the behavior of summary retrieval and creation.

methods.name: generateOrGet_returnsExisting
methods.description: Tests that the generateOrGet method returns an existing summary if it is already stored.

methods.name: generateOrGet_createsWhenMissing_countsCategories
methods.description: Tests that the generateOrGet method creates a new summary when none exists, aggregating log entries by category.
